Class AudioWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.player.PlayerWrapper
      • org.cantaloupe.audio.AudioWrapper

  • public class AudioWrapper
extends PlayerWrapper
    A player wrapper containing methods for the audio server.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
